Jun. 2015 – Apr. 2016

Languages And Technologies
◦ Languages: Proﬁcient in javascript 4 years, HTML, CSS. Familiar with Python, PHP, GraphQL, Typescript.
◦ Frameworks: VueJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, Sequelize, ExpressJS, Fastify, AngularJS, Mongoose, Apollo,
TypeGraphQL, Flow. Known how to build a framework.
◦ Database systems: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, LevelDB.

CLI Framework
